Posts.Content:
I just went to my local doctor who told me to get an appointment and get my mamogram done as soon as possible. In the prescript
ion it said the there was a 1 x 1 lump diagnosed on my left breast. I have an appointment very soon but I am getting really nervous and sad... So if someone can please tell me how bad or worse does this mean??????????????
Posts.Title: Do i have it or not?
